mapper.insert: insert ignore into topie_campus.t_survey_group_student(group_id, student_id, is_complete) VALUES (#{groupId},#{studentId},#{isComplete})
mapper.update: update topie_campus.t_survey_group_question set sort=#{sort} where group_id=#{groupId} and question_id=#{questionId}
update topie_campus.t_survey_group set online_status=#{onlineStatus} where group_id=#{groupId}
update topie_campus.t_survey_group_student set is_complete=1 where group_id=#{groupId} and student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.delete: delete from topie_campus.t_survey_group_question where group_id=#{groupId} and question_id=#{questionId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from topie_campus.t_survey_group_question where group_id=#{groupId}
select type_id from topie_campus.t_survey_group where group_id=#{groupId}
select is_complete from topie_campus.t_survey_group_student where group_id=#{groupId} and student_id = #{studentId}
select teacher_id teacherId, question_id questionId, avg(record) record from t_survey_group_question_answer where group_id=#{groupId} and question_type=1 group by teacher_id,question_id;
